
Oops! The intern reused a prime to generate two RSA keys. Can you recover the secret message? Ciphertext: 612805716229137017754541846191825745386444768946213192952156422837318366544506043992998613635569115609240834278199450057946116118545639460928140402182769387216923725338646500403978079415742295531396535850253145381034156463609313947


The flag format is flag{...}
n=884500838083352169420386841825923450365276300059034107991240888666887524366827474239323917600284530282230230554346884108064077125328784390504886727479719032075463979477250323426074326613058939658965127118307017207161921496042186001, e=367156641593182461209211756115597466685271283731136042018523685385500738088366695271854499176903381022921804561786811159253118282019381033476414562318668419391581952189687191178341948316432575949807138239522396544906968402290779741

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{mmghtvkq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 612805716229137017754541846191825745386444768946213192952156422837318366544506043992998613635569115609240834278199450057946116118545639460928140402182769387216923725338646500403978079415742295531396535850253145381034156463609313947
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=884500838083352169420386841825923450365276300059034107991240888666887524366827474239323917600284530282230230554346884108064077125328784390504886727479719032075463979477250323426074326613058939658965127118307017207161921496042186001, e=367156641593182461209211756115597466685271283731136042018523685385500738088366695271854499176903381022921804561786811159253118282019381033476414562318668419391581952189687191178341948316432575949807138239522396544906968402290779741
extra_info: p=29740558805835376727795968989503664941260551332813345389132899298388278586758274822185845915874637482920894489561751, q=29740558805835376727795968989503664941260551332813345389132899298388278586758274822185845915874637482920894489561751, Ï†(n)=884500838083352169420386841825923450365276300059034107991240888666887524366827474239323917600284530282230230554346824626946465454575328798566907720149836510972798352786472057627477550055885423109320755426475267932196079707063062500
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
